title: Is there any way to go back to the old client?

replies.body: it wont even show launch. nothing show up . just the background grafics

nope, riot done boned you and dumpster'd the old client.

I miss it too to be honest.

Nope.  The old one was worse and was long overdue for removal.
read the troubleshooting information if you are having issues.
i have done reinstalled... done a full repair... have it in low spec mode... ran as admin... set priorty on high and everything it still doesnt work...
agreed i havent been able to play a game since they force this trash on everyone.
